revised_title: Anatomical Observations of a Rare Bladder Condition in Mr. Smith of Highgate
tldr: Dr. Edward Tyson presents a case study of a patient with a rare bladder condition involving multiple cysts filled with a nutrient-rich fluid. The patient's bladder was distended with these cysts, which prevented the normal flow of urine. The condition was likely caused by the tenacity of the matter between the bladder membranes.
